content.detailedDescription:
On sunday may 24, 2015 my wife and me were sitting on our front porch enjoying the nice clear evening when at 9:45 p.M. she noticed two red-orange lights in the direction of harrisburg intl airport which is south of our location approximately 7 - 10 miles. she said the second object was west of the object described below.
when i looked, i saw one object and she said the other object just disappeared. the object was moving slow compared to aircraft we normally see and appeared to glow a red-orange color with no flashing or other lights. the object made no sound and appeared to be maybe disc shaped with a dome top. 
prior to seeing this object we had observed several planes leaving and arriving the airport which are unmistakable compared to this object which was not any airplane, helicopter, space junk or shooting star.
the object was heading almost directly north in a straight line towards us. we have two large oak trees out front of our house and when the remaining object was lower on the horizon we could clearly see it without any obstruction from the tree. once the object got closer to us it was partly obscured by the tree. i had told my wife to go in and get the camera so when it came over the tree we could try and get a photo. while she was in getting the camera i saw the light from the object through the leaves on the tree and by the time my wife came out with the camera it was gone. i never took my eyes off the object and never saw where it went. 
we got off the porch and walked all around looking for any sign of it and never saw it again. to us this was clearly a ufo.
this is our second ufo sighting and it is quite awesome. our previous sighting was about 7 years ago at [location removed/dr/cms]
content.summary: Two bright red-orange lights

content.detailedDescription: Something airborne came up from behind us while fishing, it sounded like something large and fast but there was nothing visable. there was a loud sound of air moving but no engine noise. it sounded like it flew from the north east to the south west very fast right above our heads. there was no visable evidence that anything was there as all despite being a mostly clear day. i've went over the event many time and cannot come up with an explaination for what happened, i've spoke with the other two people that observed the event and they don't know what it was either.
content.summary: We heard some kind of aircraft coming up behind us, the sound was very loud. the sound came right over our heads and disipated over the horizon in front of us. craft seemed invisible.

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i lived about half a mile east of the vegas strip. we were walking west to the strip with her boyfriend early one morning. it looked like a plane traveling in a straight line about 20 degrees over the horizon above the strip just below the mountain tops. it looked to be maybe another half mile behind the strip. then it started shooting what looked like red flares straight to the ground. it shot three flares about five minutes apart. then it shot off into space at about 45 degrees above the horizon over the mountain tops like a meteor in the opposite direction, away from the planet. it was then out of sight.
content.summary: Ufo travelled across horizon, shot 3 flares downward, shot off into space

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter of 18 years old was driving home heading south west proximally 9:30 p.M. sunday may 24th 2015 it was obvious that there is a light that just caught our attention there was a triangle shaped lights were on and a blinking a little bit and it seemed like as soon as we noticed it lights turned off and took off just quick my daughter and i looked at each other like we couldn't believe what we just saw because it was not a plane it was not anything that we were familiar with it was dark outside of course was 9:30 p.M. just kind of talked about what we saw again and that was it. 
heading home.
corpus christi heading south on everhart near cedar pass.
content.summary: Triangle shape lights on as soon as we saw it lights off and took off.

content.detailedDescription: Talking on the phone with my father on memorial day around 930 pm on my front porch; got this notion and urge to step out and look up at the sky and i walked out doing so and i was facing north then west and i could hear this inner voice tell to to turn around and look up and that's when i seen the amber colored object appear and hover for a moment then across the sky it traveled as i called to my wife, and son, all the while talking to my father then my phone went dead as it passed over . then we all watched it travel northward and not once did it make a sound nor did the light dull . no trail or tail preceded it.
content.summary: It called to me to come out and look up at the sky

content.detailedDescription: I woke up really in the morning and went into the garage which was kind of like the guest room and sat down on the bed and felt strange and laid down again im not sure is i fell asleep or what but for a period of time i was in this endless black abyss with an old television set. the screen was static  and for some reason i knew that this was different and i was had been studying islam so  i acknowledged the presence by saying ,"peace" and  it replied the same. then i said" all praise is do to allah the beneficent and merciful" it replied ," we are not allah." i asked ," who are you?" they told me that they were  her first. eventually after hours of them speaking to me through a television into my mind they showed me a series of pictures and information and an exrremely rapid rate i cant even attempt to recover it all . then i woke up in the bed. and tried to write everything down at the time i remembered a lot more i seem to have misplaced the paper over the years but i still look for it at least once a month... i also found a strange mark on my lower right leg on the inside towards my ankle and the dr. refused to look at it. and ive never seen anything like it before... ive had a few more experiences since then. im not sure what they are or how to classify them but i wasn't sure of who else i could talk to and try to figure this out.. maybe im just dreaming but whats the thing in my leg and where did i get the information. i get these maesage every few years sometimes while im suppose to be asleep wher i leave and go other places with thousands of other people and we are shown things. such as its not what most people think of god. the answer is in the stars. the answer to all religion is in the stars. i just want to know if im dreaming or if im really doing these things and i want to recall the information that i wsa given. please help me... its been following me for years im living in south carolina now and its happened twice here as well.
content.summary: Never saw the ufo i think i may have been abbductdr a couple of times

content.detailedDescription: I was between 8 to 12 years old. i was in the house making soap in a bottle to go outside and blow bubbles.The hydro had turned off. as i went outside i had noticed a u.F.O  hovering above the gas station across the road where i had lived.  there was a city bus stop right in front of my house at the time. and as the bus had drove by i did not even hear it. i don't remember if i was in a trance or not. but it felt like it.
content.summary: I was between 8 to 12 years old. i was in the house making soap in a bottle to go outside and blow bubbles.The hydro had turned off. as i went outside i had noticed a u.F.O  hovering above the gas station across the road where i had lived.  there was a ci

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to the store. i saw the object at first as a plane that did not appear to be moving. it stayed in front of me, and appeared not to move much until i grew closer. i ended up seeing it hover over the general building area i was headed. i stopped to take a picture, and as i did it turned between 45 and 90 degrees and flew off. as it flew away it changed direction again slightly. the best look i got at it, it appeared to not be a circle, and more plane like. as big as it was, it emitted no sound. it only emitted two red flashing/glowing lights from the bottom and a few constant white lights.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Driving to the store i saw a craft fly toward, pause, then fly away in a different direction.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello.

i was camping this memorial day weekend with friends and family at mount blue campground in maine. my girlfriend's mother is ill at home so we made frequent trips to a place we recieved cell phone coverage. on the way back to camp one morning after making the call, we decided to try to fool some people on facebook by taking a picture of a fake moose that looked exactly like it was walking along a hill with mt. blue in the background. my girlfriend and i were thinking this would be a great prank.

i pulled the vehicle over, got out and snapped the first photo. i had my camera zoomed out all the way and i wasn't sure if i could clearly see the moose. i immediately zoomed in and took another just in case, shut off my camera, and headed back to camp.

when we finally returned home from our trip we uploaded the photos and was shocked to see something mysterious in the sky in the second photo we took. it is located in the right side of the photo in the sky. we do not recall seeing or hearing anything at all what so ever. we would have remembered seeing anything out of the ordinary that morning. any clues or reccomendations on what this could possibly be would be greatly appreciated.
content.summary: Questionable 'speck' caught in clear maine sky.

content.detailedDescription: The sun was starting to set and i was looking at the clouds to see what shapes they looked like.  i looked towards the cornfield behind our house and there it was. it was a floating elliptical sphere-like thing and i immediately thought of a ufo.  i had never seen a ufo before, but only recently have i started looking them up and watching tv programs about them.  i didn't know if they were watching me or not.  i thought it could have been a drone because if we were going to observe aliens we probably wouldn't just go there by ourselves, we would send a probe or drone or something like that.  i saw on some websites and tv that if you know too much information that they would start to watch you. i think that is why they were there.  i was scared, but i wasn't that worried because i thought it was just a probe or something.  but i was wrong.  it started flying in random directions at incredible speeds and stopping instantly.  it kept doing this for about 10 minutes.  i wanted to run inside to call the police, but i couldn't move.  once it started behaving strangely, i became very hot, like a fever, but it was much worse.  i also became a little dizzy and shaky.  the ufo was making a static sound, and i think that was what was making me be like that.  the ufo finally stopped and just floated in the air for about a minute.  the static noise stopped, and i stopped shaking and my temperature went back to normal.  i was still too nervous to move.  i wanted to run, but i didn't know if it would chase menot.  it landed very slowly, and the lights on the ufo turned off.  i was terrified.  a door opened, and some strange shadow aliens came out.  i know the full description, but they told me not to tell anyone too much about them or our "leaders would imprison" me.  they spoke to me through their mind.  i could understand their feelings, and i could translate their thoughts into english in my mind.  they could talk to me from across my backyard with their minds.  they told me to come to them.  i could barely control my body.  it seemed like they were forcing me to walk towards them.  all of a sudden, my hair stood up like it felt like there was static electricity all around us.  they told me that my planet's life was faulty and that they could fix it.  the static electricity got more intense, and i could feel minor shocks all around my body.  a lot of bugs were lifted from the ground and were floating in a sphere around the one alien.  he said that there were too many problems with us.  they said they would start their operation when the eye of power was in control.  they said they were leaving and that if i told anyone about them, they would make me their slave that mines their mineral.  (by their mineral, i mean a rock that i have never seen, only an image of a silver rock appeared in my head.). they got back in their ship and it slowly floated upwards.  after about 50 feet, it started shaking violently and making the static sound again.  after 15 seconds of it shaking, i heard a loud boom and i passed out.  i woke up at night in a different area in the cornfield almost all the way across it.  i walked back to my house and tried to write down everything, but i forgot almost everything.  i am only telling you what i remember.  i think they wiped some of my memory.  i remember them telling me that they had almost full control over my mind.  the only other thing i remember is something about another planet in the eagle nebula, but i am not sure.  that is all i can tell you.  i think i told you too much.  right now, my hair is standing up on my head...
content.summary: {dr]it looked like a bullet and stopped and went really fast

content.detailedDescription:
I and my best friend, [names removed/dr/cms] younger brother and two or three other neighbor younger teens were watching for a rocket launch from vandenberg afb on or about may or june of 1965, possibly 1966. we were innocently playing kick the can in richard's court that evening. we were aware there was to be a rocket launch from vandenberg afb. i recall our seeing the launch, watching it's ascension into the sky via it's bright path when suddenly the rocket seemed to become erratic then blow up in the atmospher off the west coast from vafb. i stayed staring in that direction when suddenly a brilliant diamond white light appeared over the horizon (10-15 degrees) from where we had been watching and in less that a hundredth of a second the light streaked overhead (no known aircraft could travers the skies that quickly in those days of the f104 saber jets or maybe the navy panthers. a few seconds to a minute later another brilliant white light streaked and stopped overhead from the same south westerly direction, then another also just stopping dead flight overhead. i do not remember the directional sequence thereafter; however, two other brilliant diamond white lights appeared and all four objects stopped dead in their flight path above our zenith. i based their size to be between the head of pin or possibly half an aspirin size. so the objects were very high in the sky/atmosphere. as i recall they stayed motionless for about a minute maybe more; when suddenly all four objects streaked out of sight in what appeared to be the four cardinal directions. i therefore reasoned these four object were not of earth, because nothing i was aware of could fly/move that quickly and through space!

what is of significance for me then as now still, was how they just shot away from their overhead positions. as each object streaked in their own ordinate directions,their light trails stayed illuminated until the light winked out (dissipated).

the closest analogy i can describe, would be to equate a metal object moving like an earring on a tv studio persons ear during the period when tv cameras were going digital; i think sometime in the late 70's thru the 80's. when someone moved in their physical direction and reached a new position it took several thousandths of a second before the streak of light caught up with them as they came to a new stationary position. no other analogy fit for me until this or like in startreck, when, as the enterprise hyper jumped it left a dissipating light trail behind until all light source ended.

to state the obvious we were astounded and this memory has stayed indelled within my memory me for over forty years.

i must state for the record, once after returning from the service sometime between 1970 or 1971, i met again with my best friend [name removed/dr/cms] (now deceased) and asked him if he recalled our incident. he told me he did not recall any such thing. this puzzled me for years. then i remembered, he was a private pilot. and i assume he did not want to remember because it might jeopardize his pilots license. the only other person who might be able to corroborate this event would be[name removed/dr/cms]. the other two or three neighbor boys were [names removed\dr\cms]. sorry, i do not recall their last names. 

as a further aside, i once had an opportunity to relate this experience to dr. hynick (sp) of project blue book, while attending california state university chico, sometime between 1972 or 1973. he gave a presentation on ufo encounters from project bb. i told of our childhood encounter and my impression was he was non-plused and blew my event description off; turning to some other student and began talking with them. pissed me off to say the least!

since then i have rarely recounted this event to others for the obvious reasons.

in closing i do not know if this is of any value to mufon, but since it happened, i felt i would at least offer this event experience.

if you would like to speak with me feel free to call me here in [location and phone number removed/dr/cms]. hopefully others reported this event in the past too.
content.summary: 4-5 teens watching for a rocket launch from vandenberg afb 5 or 6/1965

content.detailedDescription: I was up early before daylight to go to work. my wife got up with me to see me off. there was a thunderstorm with lightning so we were standing by the front door watching the lightning drinking our morning coffee. i looked to the west and saw this cigar shaped green fluorescent object going eastwards toward the storm where it was lightning. it was so fast and went straight up into the storm where it was lightning.I estimate the distance to be 60 miles or so from where i was and it it covered that space in a matter of less than 2 seconds. i was stunned. i was in the air force and i know about objects in the air, how fast they fly, what type, and sounds that identify each aircraft. i love aircraft and know from a distance what they are. i calmly looked at my wife and asked "did you see that?" she replied yes. i said what did you see? she said it looked like a baseball to her. i was taken back by that. she agreed on the color but not the shape. what i saw was about 75 to 120 feet long. flying at about 200 to 500 feet above the ground at speeds that were astronomical. the cigar shaped fluorescent craft and i say craft because it was!! either of this world or not, it was a craft. it was so strange because what kind of man made craft would deliberately fly into lightning bolts? my wife has dismissed this easily as she dies not believe in other civilizations. but i didn't either till i saw this before my eyes. yes i have told some close friends but they think i am trying to pull the wool over their eyes. the craft was silent with no sounds or vapor trails. how can that be? my mind was boggled all day and weeks and months to come. i hope others have seen what i have, because it has haunted me for years. i  still go to work at midnight and gaze into the skies before i get into my truck and go to work hoping to see one more craft zooming through sky just to say to myself " i'm no crazy after all" , they do exists!  i just needed to get this off my chest after 19 years. thank you for listening.
content.summary: Long cigar shaped. green fluorescent fuzzy like. traveling over 60 miles in 2 seconds. no sound.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my friend was at mcdonald's in ayia napa, cyprus for some lunch. when we finished and went back outside, we sat on our quads. i then looked up into the sky and saw this object. i then pointed it out to my friend who also looked up and saw this object. as i was pointing it out to him, some other random people looked up also, and they noticed it to. i didn't have a clue what the object was as i saw this robotic arm extending out, then retracting, then repeating this process numerous times. the object was completely stationary with no side movement or up and down movement. the only movement was from the arm. there was no lights coming from the object and there was no sound what so ever? the object was a dome shape with a flat black base, but the rest of the body and arm was grey. my feelings were of confusion as i can't explain what the object is? my reaction was of calm nature, but curiously quizzing my friend. i had the same feelings during and after the sighting. even until now. unfortunately we had an appointment at 12pm, so we were already running late, and had to leave the scene of the sighting? because of this i was unable to record a video, which i regret not doing.
content.summary: Hovering dome with robotic arm extending out then retracting.

content.detailedDescription: Standing in backyard having conversation with a friend. i was looking back toward the tree line hoping to see some deer. there were several planes in the sky at various altitudes and flight paths. i noticed an unusual light ( resembled a star) just above tree line and it was kind of wavering or floating no particular direction. i attempted to get my friend to observe it as well but he thought i was jerking his chain so he didn't turn to look until the object blinked out or just basically dimmed until gone. ther wed stars in the sky and it was exceptionally clear that night. there is an af base nearby however they generally don't fly at night and i know the difference between a plane helo or a balloon and this was none of them. the video i have submitted is from an event that happened a month before this event in the same area.
content.summary: Bright light appeared over tree line hovered sort of floated around a bit then put off yellowish ring and

content.detailedDescription:
I am afraid of saying but hope this things wont be posted anywhere i just want answer from you guys what happen to me is real or fake?

its as 11 may i was getting up at 2 a.M.

was not able to get up and got some electric feel in my body and gone in paralytic mode was in sleep position but was flying everything seem to move around my window was open.

whatever i seen was not beleivable.

at tree outside mine window was white lite 5 minutes when i gone in paralised position i seen white lite and 5 livin creatures lemon head body like reptile or dinasaur. they were not touching me but wwhere enchanting or mummering on me it 2 hours  and was on bed floating dont wkow whats goin was seeing but not able to move or shout louder. at last they disappered and 10 minutes after that i came to normal position.But when i check my mobile phone and i was afraid totally hand shaking the time 2.10 a.M.

means 10 minutes have only passed and i was since like 2 hours there then i went to drink water was totally afraid.

so i though to report it somehwere.

1.I dont want any investigation on this?

2.I am totally afraid and getting pscho day by day.

need answer from expert what i ahve seen was real or a dream.

everything that day was electricity and 5 cretures aroun for 2 hours.

content.summary: I was sleeping and window was open around 2 a.M. i was in mode of flying some 4-5 persons were there.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving a parking lot when i saw a military truck full of military personal parking at an ihop restaurant  i thought that was strange so i drove around to take a pic  when i got to a good location most of the personal already went inside. i  took two pics then drove off.  when i was going to send the pic in an email i noticed an object in the sky that looked very odd in one of the photos.
content.summary: Looked at a photo i took earlier and noticed this object in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
After work, walking home after exiting the bus at between 1:08 to 1:10 am on may 23, 2015, i have a .3 to .4 mile residential street walk to my building when i first noticed two objects about 1/3 along my way. between two major streets, it becomes very peaceful and quiet. beautiful, mostly clear night, taking in the stars. looked left (east) and saw two orange red glowing spots above the trees and roof-lines. 

the objects were in a steady glide and kept spatially relative to each other. there were no other familiar, identifying lights and they caused sound nor emitted any vibrations.  

i stopped to watch them and noticed they left no streaks behind them in transit and were not "shooting" at a fast rate of speed as a shooting star or meteor would.

as they glided above, they dimmed at first and the left one blinked out, the remaining one dimmed a bit more then disappeared from sight.

i scanned the sky around the area they had been but could see no indication of their presence. i scanned then in the direction they seemed headed and again saw them further to my right (westerly). they were again noticeably bright. as i observed, they were now on a more north westerly tack. once again, they dimmed, as before, one blinked out but the other remained dimly glowing for a short time and them disappeared.

i scanned the skies for a few moments and saw nothing else so i continued my walk, still checking the sky.

thinking the experience was over, and perhaps 150' to 200' further along, again out of the eastern sky, two more objects of the same description appeared above the trees and roofs. these also glided steadily and in a spatial relationship with each other and made no sound or vibrations. i stopped to watch.

directionally, the path of these two was different, heading on a wsw tack. again they dimmed and one after the other, they blinked out. at this point in my walk, i was close to my destination and there is a lot more light pollution in the area.  i could not spot any further indication of them.

we get to observe annual meteor showers in this area and i have seen shooting stars, some close to the ground. i know what those look like. these were none of those.
content.summary: Two sets of two orbs, both out of east. set 1 went nw, set 2 went wsw.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting outside having a cigarette it was very bright, at first thought it was a star but it was slowly ascending and dropping,
over two hour duration it got as low as tree tops then rose slowly higher untill disappeared behding a building. 
adrenaline was rushing for the two hours while i was observing the object its like nothing ever seen before.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Noticed a light that seemed too bright to be a star as well as too low.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog on the above evening there was very little cloud it was a crisp winters evening but with no frost i live close to the derbyshire moors so there is little light pollution . as i walked along the road i saw what i thought to be a really bright star it was hard to differentiate how high it was because of lots of stars in the sky but i couldn't stop looking at it because of the brightness of it . as i got more or less beneath it a strange thing happened i had never seen anything like it a massive smoke ring appeared round it and the object shot straight up at great speed i didn't take my eyes of the object it looked like it was stationary but it was by now very small and when i looked away i could no longer see it amongst the star lit night then the smoke ring just dispersed i had no idea what it could have been but i know it was definitely not a plane or a helicopter or a balloon . i told my wife on my return about the encounter we are or were both very sceptical but then some 2 weeks later my wife accompanied me walking the dog about the same time of night 10 pm and we both saw a spherical looking object so bright come from behind a cloud and then go back again and till this day nobody will ever tell me i was wrong in what i saw then me and my wife saw
content.summary: A silver ball in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
While changing shifts at work, i happened to look west and spotted a brite
red/orange ball traveling in a north/northeast direction. called to coworker who also saw and tried to film with phone. object traveled by until out of site. we both where shocked and unsure of what it was.
content.summary: Red/orange ball traveled across sky from south to north/northeast

content.detailedDescription: I was camping at elk island national park some time in the summer, i'm guessing it was 1973 or1974 with a buddy of mine. i lived in sherwood park from 1972 to 1975. i was star gazing on a clear night with my head out of my pup tent when i saw this triangle of colored lights moving in a zig-zag erratic pattern that could not have been a fixed wing aircraft or a helicopter. i heard no noise while these lights moved back and forth, changing directions abruptly as well as elevation, then after a while moved up and off very quickly in one direction and was gone. i had no idea what i had witnessed, and my buddy in his tent next to me was in his tent, and did not see what happened. i don't know what i had seen, but knew what it was not, any type of aircraft that was around in 1974! i believe it was a pattern of 7 lights that were not flashing, and moved in unison. someone else must have seen this, but it was a long time ago, so i can't recall the date, the month, or even the year, but this is something i will never forget that i have seen an unexplained craft of some type. at the time i would have been a high-school student, and i was not under any influence of alcohol or any drugs!
content.summary: V shape moving erratically then up and away very quickly

content.detailedDescription:
My partner and i were outside on the verandah feeding our dog. it was just before dinner time, around 7:30 pm when we heard a short loud indescribable noise. we ran out onto the grass just off the verandah and spotted what appeared to be a falling ball of fire. i initially thought it was flaming debris from someones firecracker, as there is a large field of bushland meters away. however, it appeared to move n-ne in a starlight line, defying cross winds. as it descended slowly towards us, getting bigger and brighter, we could distinctively see the colours of its flames, beating just like a candle and bright yellow. you could begin to hear cracking and popping noises, just as if you were next to a camp fire. it appeared to be right above us just hovering in one place, in what seemed to be minutes passing by. the fireball then started to move in an upward angle, we could feel the heat emanating from it as it began to ascend in a s-sw line. it faded slowly, not like it was going out, but as if it was moving farther away giving a soft orange-red glow, before disappearing from sight. 

i decided to report the incident to the bureau of meteorolgy and the local observatory, and their responses were almost identical. stating that there was a jet demonstration that afternoon where the pilots burned their fuel. they also described in detail what fuel burning is, as if it was definitive that the object was nothing more. 

my upbringing was in a royal air force family, and we see many demonstrations of jet fly-bys and fuel burning, but none that last more than seconds. none that can match the movement or duration of what we had seen that night. 

i am still uncertain of what we had witness that night in 2004.
content.summary: Fireball in appearance from observing angle, cracking and popping sounds present and heat could be felt as it ascended .

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I smoke outside only. three a.M. memorial day. i don't drink, am sober as a judge, as they say.

i looked up from the neighborhood lights and saw a soft-white orb, seemingly ephemeral, cloud-like. it went from nickel-sized to golfball-sized and brightened by two times in the space of a second and completely vanished. it did not blink off but faded away.

that's it. i wish there was more.
content.summary: Soft-white cloud-like orb, brightened & increased in size from nickel to golfball & vanished.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: this happend out side of rhome texas ,i went out side to my car  and i caught somthing bright out of the corner of my eye when i first looked at it or them i thought it was just a group of really bright stars 3 of them i was looking thinking , how pretty then one moved and then another so i started watching kinda in shock then two of them started moving around each other zig zaging  and going up n down just moving crazy i was shocked and in amazement i ran got my husband made him come out side and look then i ran n got my brother n his wife  and my kids so they could see this it was somthing to see , then the one got really bright i mean super bright like it was going to explod or somthing it went straight up then stoped just like  stood there in place then it turned droped then it flew over us  it was a diamond shape from   under neath  kinda hard to explain it looked round  but standing under it as it flew by the lights was in a diamond shape , it went right over us and for as low as it was flying it was rathet quit we watched it get lower and lower as it flew away into the trees where wr lost sight of it .I took as many pics as i could .It was a experience i wont forget kinda got all of us aww and left puzzled and a little scared.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: We seen bright like stars moving around each other  one got really bright  went straight up then turned and flew over us

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog and just happened to look up and saw a large orange bright fiery looking object traveling southwest in the sky. and headed towards a cloud and then just did not come out of the other side. by the time i grabbed my phone to take a picture it had disappeared into a cloud and did not come back out.
content.summary: Large bright orange light traveling southwest

content.detailedDescription: Meridian, id, at approximately 22:30. i just walked out to the backyard to let the dogs in. i saw three reddish orange orbs in the sky looking true north. the orbs were all moving the same speed and were spaced equal distance. i do not know what objects were. i attempted to film orbs on my phone but there was not enough light to find the orbs in the view finder. orbs moved from west to east and were visable for approximately two minutes. i quickly ran inside to get my daughter to be witness. by the time we arrived outside again, two of the orbs had vanished. the last orb was visible for around thirty seconds, then faded out while moving to the east. orbs looked to be far away to the north. orbs stayed at approximately 25-30 degrees above the horizon.
content.summary: Three reddish orange orbs moving equidistance at equal speed.

content.detailedDescription: When i first spotted the object i was scanning the sky, as i always am, while i was on the way home from pressure washing with my dad. i first noticed it as a star like object that maybe could have been a plane's headlights, but the object was not moving accept for possibly an occasional bob or ascension. so i attempted to get my dad to look at the light but he was focused on pulling the trailer into the garage, so he didn't see it, the light went out of my line of sight for about 5 seconds due to a tree obstructing my view. i jumped out of the truck as quickly as possible to regain a view of the object, but when i went into the street and looked around for the light it was nowhere to be found. i've had many ufo sightings in the past few months at the address above, and at places such as the pdx airport, these ufo encounters are beginning to seem personal, even though that is likely not the case. i wish i had photo evidence of this sighting, but it happened so fast i couldn't react quick enough.
content.summary: Unexpected and question raising

content.detailedDescription: The object was in the far distance. it was glowing red. it flew towards us from the se. it stopped. hovered then rose several hundred feet then completely disappeared.
content.summary: Flew toward us then hovered then rose up and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in front of my garage in a chair enjoying the beautiful warm night. i was just looking out above the house in front of me at the clear skies and stars. then all of a sudden i see this bright red circle flying north in a straight line. i was stunned at what i was seeing and pulled my phone out of my pocket and took 2 pictures of it as it gracefully passed by. i lost sight when it went passed some trees. the crazy part was it did not make the slightest sound and it wasn't that high in the sky. it was flying about the height that life flight helicopters would fly and they make lots of noise.
content.summary: Bright red light just flying in a straight line low altitude and absolutly no sound. really strange that there was no sound what so ever.

content.detailedDescription:
1. at around 5pm est, on garden state parkway going north bound by exit 100. 

2. i was confused trying to figure out what it was. it wasn't a plane, bird, blimp, helicopter, etc. my brain was trying to process something it couldn't

3. a dark cloud and they i thought it was a bird and then airplane or blimp. but it wasn't any of that.

4. me and my wife saw it but we did not say anything to each other. i was just trying to figure it out in my head what it was. i saw 2 planes by it and it made the airplane look small. i would say it was about 1 mile away and appeared pretty big. 

5. i was confused and trying to make sense of it because i'm a logical guy and i always try to have an explanation for things but this one i couldn't explain. 

6. we kept going north and eventually passed it by. funny thing is i didn't say anything to my wife till we got to our destination and when she mentioned it, i was like holy cow. i was thinking the same thing
content.summary: It was dark grey and shape like rectangle cigar like. skinny rectangle
